Is a generic condition with an outcome that is happens naturally, logically or customarily and that is applied in general.   
Is a generic condition with an outcome that is repetitive or habitual and that is applied to a particular instance.

##### younisuru

<p style="font-size:13px; line-height: 0.5; font-family: Roboto Condensed;  color: #1e3842; font-weight: bold">**<u>younisuru</u>** `to try to do somethingãƒ»to make an effort to do something`</p>
<p style="font-size:13px; line-height: 0.5; font-family: Roboto Condensed;  color: #1e3842; font-weight: bold">**<u>youninaru</u>** `to become like somethingãƒ»to end up like something`</p>
<p style="font-size:13px; line-height: 0.5; font-family: Roboto Condensed;  color: #1e3842; font-weight: bold">**<u>kotonisuru</u>** `to make something happenãƒ»to ensure something`</p>
<p style="font-size:13px; line-height: 0.5; font-family: Roboto Condensed;  color: #1e3842; font-weight: bold">**<u>kotoninaru</u>** `to have something decidedãƒ»to have something set orarranged`</p>
<div class = "add_infos">
ãƒ»<b>nisuru:</b>single or occasional action. carry out right after or in the future.    
ãƒ»<b>ninaru:</b>single or to be completed action, event or situation. set to occur right after or soon in the future.         
ãƒ»<b>nishita:</b>single completed action. carried out or done.    
ãƒ»<b>ninatta:</b>single completed action, event or situation. occurred or happened.         
</div>

<p style="font-size:13px; line-height: 0.5; font-family: Roboto Condensed;  color: #1e3842; font-weight: bold">**<u>younishiteiru</u>** `to try to do somethingãƒ»to make an effort to do something`</p>
<p style="font-size:13px; line-height: 0.5; font-family: Roboto Condensed;  color: #1e3842; font-weight: bold">**<u>youninatteiru</u>** `to become like somethingãƒ»to end up like something`</p>
<p style="font-size:13px; line-height: 0.5; font-family: Roboto Condensed;  color: #1e3842; font-weight: bold">**<u>kotonishiteiru</u>** `to make something happenãƒ»to ensure something`</p>
<p style="font-size:13px; line-height: 0.5; font-family: Roboto Condensed;  color: #1e3842; font-weight: bold">**<u>kotoninatteiru</u>** `to have something decidedãƒ»to have something set or arranged`</p>
<div class = "add_infos">
ãƒ»<b>nishiteiru:</b>on going, continuous or habitual action.

</div>

<p style="font-size:13px; line-height: 0.5; font-family: Roboto Condensed;  color: #1e3842; font-weight: bold">**â‘  younisuru**ãƒ»**younishiteiru**</p>

dliwrd.a <- dliwrd %>% slice(1:1550)

htmltools::browsable(
  tagList(
    div(
      div(class = "chartz", tags$label("ã€Levelã€‘", `for` = "words-level-filter"),
      # div(
        tags$select(
          id = "words-level-filter",
          onchange = "Reactable.setFilter('words-filter-table', 'Level', this.value)",
          tags$option("All", value = ""),
          lapply(unique(dliwrd.a$Level), tags$option)
        # )
      ))
    ),
    # tags$hr("aria-hidden" = "true"),

reactable(
  dliwrd.a,
  columns = list(
    Words = colDef(style= list(background = '#f9f6ed'), minWidth = 900,
      cell = function(value, index) {
        Meaning <- dliwrd.a$Meaning[index]
        Meaning <- if (!is.na(Meaning)) Meaning else ""
        Sentences <- dliwrd.a$Sentences[index]
        Sentences <- if (!is.na(Sentences)) Sentences else ""
        Translation <- dliwrd.a$Translation[index]
        Translation <- if (!is.na(Translation)) Translation else ""
        tagList(
          div(span(style = list(fontSize = 22, fontWeight = 600, color = '#101010', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), value), " ", span(style = list(fontSize = 12, fontWeight = 600, color = '#800000', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), Meaning)),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 11, fontWeight = 400, color = '#026450', fontFamily = 'Zen Kaku Gothic New'), Translation),
          div(style = list(fontSize = 14, fontWeight = 400, color = '#101010', fontFamily = 'Open Sans'), Sentences),

        )
      },
      align = "left"
    ),
    Level = colDef(show = FALSE),
    Meaning = colDef(show = FALSE),
    Sentences = colDef(show = FALSE),

  ),

      padding = "0px"

  ),

  style = list(fontFamily = "Noto Sans JP, Heiti SC, Hiragino Maru Gothic ProN, Anonymous Pro , monospace, Helvetica Neue", fontSize = "11px")
  )
  )
)
